title.rendered: Fry’s Chick’n Sweet Potato Waffle with Chilli Maple

content.rendered:
Fry’s Chick’n Sweet Potato Waffle with Chilli Maple

Ingredients

Ingredients:
1 pack of Fry’s Chicken Style Strips
2 tbsp Cornflour
A little oil for frying
For the waffle batter:
250 g Sweet potato (or two sweet potatoes), cooked
2 tbsp Baking powder
140 g Oats
140 g Plain flour
A pinch of salt
2 tsp Ground cinnamon
240 ml Plant milk
A little coconut oil for frying
For the maple chilli sauce:
4 tbsp Maple syrup
1 tsp chilli flakes
A sprinkle of sea salt

Directions

Combine all ingredients for the waffle batter in a blender until smooth. Heat and grease the waffle maker and make three large waffles from it.

Coat the chicken style strips in a little cornflour and crispy fry them in hot oil in a non-stick frying pan.

Combine the maple syrup with the chilli and a sprinkle of sea salt in a small jug

Serve the waffles hot, topped with the crispy chicken style strips and drizzle with the chilli maple sauce
